channel.title: How to increase the size of Whonix screen?
channel.description: I just got Whonix working but the screen size is extremely small, even the edges of the screen are cut off. Is there any way to increase the size of Whonix? I'd imagine it would have to do with the VirtualBox settings but I'm not sure exactly what to change.

item.title: How to increase the size of Whonix screen?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: How to increase the size of Whonix screen?

item.title: How to increase the size of Whonix screen?

item.description:
I just got Whonix working but the screen size is extremely small, even the edges of the screen are cut off. Is there any way to increase the size of Whonix? I’d imagine it would have to do with the VirtualBox settings but I’m not sure exactly what to change.
